item.title: How to set up a static Hugo website on GitHub pages in 2 minutes
item.author: support@appernetic.io (Admin)
item.description: A static website is fast and secure but it is not easy to set up a new blog or website if you don’t know a lot of commands, tools and also how to install them when you would rather like to be writing exciting content to distribute on the Internet! First,â€‹ you have to: download the right version of the static website generator for your OS and architecture. install git create a GitHub, Bitbucket, Dropbox or Amazon S3 account or set-up a web server with a web Host.
